name: Mimic (itch) (LordL75)
description:
In Mimic, you race two squares to the end of each level against the always expanding void.  Mimic is a turn based game, so as you move the void inches toward you, tile by tile. Will you be able to beat it? Better yet collect each cube's coin? And is it possible to finish every level on the hardest difficulty? Test your wits and find out what you're made of by downloading the game!

Controls

Arrow keys - Move

R/Space - Restart

Escape - Exit

If you encounter a bug in a level, please restart it and it should be fixed.
